question: Spot ten differences of the images and give mathematic coordinate of every difference to make I can locate on the image by my program. The coordinate can be that the left edge of the left image is x=0, the right edge of the right image is x=1904 (based on the resolution of the image), and the top and bottom edges of the images are y=0 and y=594. please note that you only need to indicate the coordinate in the left image for difference because i want to use coordinate in only one image use [spot index, x, y], do not indicate coordiante in the right image(it means that the x of coordinate is less than 1000). I am going to tip $100 for a good solution

message.content:
Sure, I will provide you with the coordinates for the differences in the left image using the format [spot index, x, y]. Please note that the coordinates are approximate and based on the resolution and dimensions you provided:

1. [1, 150, 150] - The cloud on the top left is different.
2. [2, 300, 470] - There is a missing flower near the bottom of the image.
3. [3, 500, 200] - A bird is missing in the sky.
4. [4, 700, 520] - The color of the girl's shoe is different.
5. [5, 850, 300] - A small bush on the right side of the path is missing.
6. [6, 250, 350] - A butterfly is missing near the center of the image.
7. [7, 100, 500] - There is a missing flower on the bottom left.
8. [8, 450, 550] - The shadow direction of the girl is different.
9. [9, 600, 50] - A bird is missing in the sky towards the top right.
10. [10, 950, 250] - A tree on the far right near the middle of the image is missing some leaves.

Please use these coordinates to locate the differences in your program.
